docs.summary: Create and manage Wix Groups.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `memberIds` instead.
This parameter will be removed on June 30, 2022.

docs.summary:
Add site members to a specific group.
Admins always have access to this functionality. Site owners may allow members to use this functionality as well.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: groupRequestIds
params.doc: Group Request IDs to approve. Limited to `100`.

docs.summary:
Approves Group Requests. 
Only admins can approve Group Requests.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `memberIds` instead.
This parameter will be removed on June 30, 2022.

Required if `memberIds` is not provided.

params.name: memberIds
params.doc:
Member IDs to approve.
__Important:__ This parameter will be required after the deprecated `siteMemberIds` is removed on June 30, 2022.

docs.summary:
Approves pending join group requests.
Group managers always have access to this functionality. In some cases, site owners will allow group members to use this functionality as well.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `memberIds` instead.
This parameter will be removed on June 30, 2022.

params.name: memberIds
params.doc: Member IDs. Limited to 100 member IDs. See [Members API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/members/members/member-object) for details.

docs.summary:
Assigns a specific role to members.
>**Notes:**
> + Only admins can assign roles.
> + You cannot create new members via this endpoint.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: creatorId
params.doc: ID of the member who created the group. This member will automatically become an admin. See [Members API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/members/members/about-wix-members) for more details.

docs.summary:
Creates a group.
>**Notes:**
> + The site owners may not allow members to create groups.
> + Specify a `creatorId` to set the group's creator.
> + The group's creator will automatically become an admin.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: groupId
params.doc: ID of the group to delete.

docs.summary:
Hides a group from the Group List or cancels group request.
>**Notes:**
> + Only admins can delete a group.
> + The group will no longer be visible in the live site or the dashboard.
> + It is not possible to restore the group via the [Update Group](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-groups/groups/group/update-group) endpoint into the live site.
> + It is still possible to retrieve the group via the [Get Group](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-groups/groups/group/get-group), [List Groups](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-groups/groups/group/list-groups) and [Query Groups](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-groups/groups/group/query-groups) endpoints.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: groupId
params.doc: ID of the group to retrieve.

docs.summary: Retrieves a group.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: slug
params.doc: Unique part of the group's URL, for example `group-1` in `https:/example.com/groups/group-1`. Pass only the slug. Case-sensitive.

docs.summary: Retrieves a group by slug.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

params.name: limit
params.doc: Number of items to load. Maximum `100.`

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 group members, given the provided paging.
Groups mangers can retrieve group members of any group.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: limit
params.doc: Number of items to load. Maximum `100`.

params.name: offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

docs.summary: Lists group requests across the site.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: limit
params.doc: Number of items to load. Maximum `100`.

params.name: offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

docs.summary: Retrieves up to 100 groups.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 join group requests, given the provided paging.
Group managers always have access to this functionality (site members can access their own join group requests in the site).

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 members and their membership status, given the provided paging.
Groups mangers can see all memberships for any group.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 group members, given the provided paging, sorting and filtering.
Groups mangers can retrieve group members of any group.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `role`

Supported fields for sorting:
- `joinedOn`
- `role`

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of groups requests across the site.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `status`

Supported fields for sorting:
- `createdDate`

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves up to 100 groups, given the provided paging, filtering, and sorting.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `title`

Supported fields for sorting:
- `title`
- `createdDate`
- `membersCount`
- `recentActivityDate`

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 join group requests, given the provided paging and filtering.
Group managers always have access to this functionality (site members can access their own join group requests in the site).

Supported fields for filtering:
- `status`

No supported fields for sorting

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberId
params.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use the `memberId` path parameter instead.
This parameter will be removed on June 30, 2022.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 members and their membership status, given the provided paging and filtering.
Groups mangers can see all memberships for any group.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `role`
- `status`

No supported fields for sorting.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Rejects Group Requests.
Only admins can reject Group Requests.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Rejects pending join group requests.
Group managers always have access to this functionality. In some cases, site owners will allow group members to use this functionality as well.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `memberIds` instead.
This parameter will be removed on June 30, 2022.

docs.summary:
Removes site members from a specific group.
Only admins have can remove members from a group.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `memberIds` instead.
This parameter will be removed on June 30, 2022.

params.name: memberIds
params.doc: Member IDs. Limited to 100 member IDs. See [Members API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/members/members/member-object) for details.

docs.summary:
Unassigns a role from members.
>**Notes:**
> + Only admins can unassign roles.
> + You cannot remove members via this endpoint.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Updates a group.
>**Note:**
> + Only admins can update a group.
> + When `group.privacyLevel` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `PUBLIC`, all pending group join requests are automatically approved.
> + When `group.privacyLevel` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `SECRET`, all pending group join requests are automatically rejected.
Triggered when a Group Request is approved.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a Group Request is rejected.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a group is deleted.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a group is created.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a group is updated. See payload for more information about the specific trigger.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups

docs.summary: Triggered when a group's logo is changed.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a group's description is changed.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a join group request is approved by a group admin or a groups manager.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a join group request is rejected by a group admin or a groups manager.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a role is assigned to an existing member.

permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

events.name: Role Unassigned From Group Member Webhook

docs.summary: Triggered when a role is removed from a member.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Triggered when a new member is added to a group, either directly by an admin or when a Join Request is approved.
        option (wix.api.required) = "AddGroupMembersRequest.member_ids";

members.name: logo
members.doc: Group logo. You cannot upload your own logo.

members.name: membersTitle
members.doc: What group members are called, for example `Coworkers`, `Friends`, or `Students`.

members.name: position
members.doc: Position of the corner of the cover image (or logo).

members.name: mobilePosition
members.doc: Position of the corner of the cover image (or logo) for mobile browser.

members.name: membersPermittedToInvite
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `membersCanInvite` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: membersCanInvite
members.doc:
Whether regular members are permitted to invite new members.
 If `false`, only admins can invite members. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: membersPermittedToApprove
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `membersCanApprove` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: membersCanApprove
members.doc:
Whether all group members are permitted to approve join group requests.
 If `false`, member approval is limited to the admins.

members.name: memberWelcomePostEnabled
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `welcomeMemberPostEnabled` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: welcomeMemberPostEnabled
members.doc: Whether a daily post about new members is enabled.

members.name: groupDetailsChangedPostEnabled
members.doc: Whether an automatic post about changing the group details is enabled.

members.name: showMemberList
members.doc: Whether all members can see the full member list.

members.name: slug
members.doc: A unique part of a group's URL, for example `https:/example.com/groups/slug`.

members.name: privacyLevel
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `privacyStatus` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: privacyStatus
members.doc:
Group privacy status.
- `PUBLIC` - Anyone can see the group and its content. Anyone can join the group.
- `PRIVATE` - Anyone can see the group, but only members can see its content. New member must submit a `Join Group Request`.
- `SECRET` - Only admins and members can see the group. New members can only be added by other members.

members.name: title
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `name` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: details
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__
For `details.logo`, use `coverImage` instead.
For `details.membersTitle`, `memberTitle` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: memberTitle
members.doc: What group members are called, for example `Coworkers`, `Friends`, or `Students`.

members.name: coverImage
members.doc: Cover image. You cannot upload your own cover image.

members.name: settings
members.doc: Group specific settings. Available to the site owners under `Admin Tools` in the dashboard.

members.name: membersCount
members.doc: Total count of current group members.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `ownerId` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time of the latest group update.

members.name: recentActivityDate
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `lastActivityDate` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: lastActivityDate
members.doc: Date and time of the most recent group activity, for example a post or comment.

docs.summary:
>**Notes:**
> + Site owners may set that members are not permitted to create groups in the Wix Groups application settings.
> + In this situation, site members have to submit a Group Request to create a new group.
> + Group Requests can be approved or rejected by an admin.
> + After a Group Request has been approved, the new group is added to the Group List in the Wix Groups app home page.
> + See [Introduction](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-groups/groups/introduction#wix-groups_groups_introduction_terminology) for more details.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of group request.
- `PENDING` - Pending group request.
- `APPROVED` - Approved group request.
- `REJECTED` - Rejected group request.
- `CANCELED` - Canceled group request.

members.name: siteMemberId
members.doc:
__Deprecated.__ Use `memberId` instead.
This property will be removed on June 30, 2022.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID. See [Members API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/members/members/about-wix-members) for more details.

members.name: joinedDate
members.doc: Date and time the group Member joined the group.

docs.summary:
To join a private group, a site member must submit a Join Request, which can be approved or rejected by an admin.
When the request is approved, the site member becomes a group member.

members.name: siteMemberId
members.doc: Member ID. See [Members API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/members/members/about-wix-members) for more details.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Join group request status.
- `PENDING` - Pending join group request.
- `APPROVED` - Approved join group request.
- `REJECTED` - Rejected join group request.
- `CANCELED` - Canceled join group request.

docs.summary: Answer to a membership question.

A group member may have multiple roles in a single group.
Currently, only `MEMBER` and `ADMIN` roles are supported, but more roles may be available in the future.

members.name: value
members.doc:
Member's role.
- `MEMBER` - Regular group member.
- `ADMIN` - Group administrator.

members.name: membership
members.doc:
Membership status.
- `NONE` - Site member is not a group member.
- `JOINED` - Site member is a group member.
- `PENDING` - Site member has submitted a Join Request that is still `PENDING`.

members.name: role
members.doc: Member's role. Equals to `UNKNOWN_ROLE` in case a site member has not joined a group.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Membership status with Group
- `JOINED` - Site member is a group member.
- `PENDING` - Site member has submitted a Join Request for this group that is still `PENDING`.

members.name: role
members.doc: Group member role. When membership status is not `JOINED`, this is empty.

members.name: id
members.doc: Member ID of the group creator.  See [Members API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/members/members/about-wix-members) for more details.

members.name: rejectionReason
members.doc: Reason the request has been rejected.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member has joined.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member was added to.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member has left.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member was removed from.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID for which join request was approved.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID for which join request was rejected.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID for which join request was cancelled.

messages.name: _wix_social_groups_api_v2_RoleAssignedToGroupMember
messages.displayName: Role Assigned To Group Member Object

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID in which role was assigned.

members.name: groupMember
members.doc: Group member to whom the role was assigned.

members.name: assignedById
members.doc: ID of site member who assigned the role. It can be empty if the role was assigned by a third-party application.

messages.name: _wix_social_groups_api_v2_RoleUnassignedFromGroupMember
messages.displayName: Role Unassigned From Group Member Object

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID in which role was unassigned.

members.name: groupMember
members.doc: Group member from whom role was removed.

members.name: unassignedById
members.doc: ID of site member who unassigned the role. It can be empty if the role was assigned by a third-party application.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:  
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: fields
members.doc: Array of projected fields. A list of specific field names to return. If `fieldsets` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Array of named, predefined sets of projected fields. A array of predefined named sets of fields to be returned. Specifying multiple `fieldsets` will return the union of fields from all sets. If `fields` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATUS
  • PENDING - Pending request.
  • APPROVED - Approved request.
  • REJECTED - Rejected request.
  • CANCELLED - Cancelled request.
  • CANCELED - Canceled request.

Possible values are:
  • BY_ID - Take into account only items which are listed in request.
  • ALL_ITEMS - Update all items.

Possible values are:
  • ALL - All items.
  • CURRENT_MEMBER - Items for current site member.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ADMIN_APPROVAL
  • PAID_PLANS
  • EVENTS

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • PUBLIC - Anyone can see the group in the group list and view its content. Anyone can join.
  • PRIVATE - Anyone can see the group in the group list, but only group members can see its content. In order to join a group, a group join request must be submitted.
  • SECRET - Only group members and admins can see the group in the group list. New group members can only be added by existing group members.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ROLE
  • MEMBER - Regular group member.
  • ADMIN - Group administrator.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_MEMBERSHIP
  • NONE - Site member is not a group member.
  • JOINED - Site member is a group member.
  • PENDING - Site member has join request with PENDING status for this group.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATUS
  • JOINED - Site member is a group member.
  • PENDING - Site member has join group request with `PENDING` status for this group.

Possible values are:
  • USER
  • MEMBER

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC
